overview: Kyoko Fukada's 3rd DVD release!! The only official item that allows you to enjoy her outstanding performance in songs, dramas, and commercials. It is composed with a music documentary touch, full of valuable recording scenes, off-shots, and promotional video making shots until she debuted as the singer she most admired. Of course, the promotional videos for her hit singles "Saigo no Kajitsu" and "Easy Rider" are also included. Region(ALL)/Scope(4:3)/Color/Stereo/40 minutes.
title: for you
